chefs.bio: Quis risus sed vulputate odio ut maecenas, Quis risus sed vulputate odio ut maecenas.
chefs.name: Gordon Ramsay

recipe_item.title: Classic Vanilla Cake
recipe_item.cooking_method: Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C). In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar together until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in the vanilla extract. Gradually add in the flour, mixing until just combined. Pour the batter into a greased 9-inch (23 cm) cake pan. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center of the cake comes out clean. Let the cake cool in the pan for 5 minutes before removing and transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

Pour the batter into a greased 9-inch (23 cm) cake pan. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center of the cake comes out clean. Let the cake cool in the pan for 5 minutes before removing and transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

recipe_item.title: Red Velvet Cake
ingredients: 1 box of red velvet cake mix
recipe_item.cooking_method: Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C). In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar together until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in the vanilla extract. Gradually add in the flour, mixing until just combined. Pour the batter into a greased 9-inch (23 cm) cake pan. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center of the cake comes out clean. Let the cake cool in the pan for 5 minutes before removing and transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.

recipe_item.title: Strawberry Shortcake
ingredients: 1/2 cup unsalted butter, cold and cubed
1 cup heavy cream, plus extra for topping
recipe_item.cooking_method: Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C). In a large mixing bowl, cream the softened butter and sugar together until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Stir in the vanilla extract. Gradually add in the flour, mixing until just combined. Pour the batter into a greased 9-inch (23 cm) cake pan. Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center of the cake comes out clean. Let the cake cool in the pan for 5 minutes before removing and transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
